name: DugiLan | Woocommerce Figma UI Kit & Template
description:
E-Commerce website for Wordpress Themes and Plugins. The client required that the website must be in Wordpress CMS and together with developers we decided to use WooCommerce plugin for designing and developing website.

View full project in Behance: https://bit.ly/WireDugi
